bezulu.title: Be Zulu! Podcast
bezulu.subTitle: Web audio player for podcast
bezulu.description:
Because sometimes you need to reach your audience in a single click on a smartphone...

<small class="block opacity-50">Configure your podcast (url, title, etc.), gather your audio files and publish/update your RSS feed and a web app at once! </small>
bezulu.about:
*Be Zulu!* is a crew of swiss electronic music DJ's.
They publish they mixes on iTunes via their *Be Zulu! Podcast* since 2006.

ferencfarkas.title: Ferenc Farkas official website
ferencfarkas.subTitle: A reference Jamstack website
ferencfarkas.description:
Unbeatable performance, no security issue whatsoever, everything open source, full control and ownership of data with costs reduced to a minimum: *zero* :nerd_face:...

<small class="block opacity-75">[Markdown](https://gohugo.io) for rich content, [YAML](https://yaml.org/) for text-based catalogue of works application, [Hugo](https://gohugo.io) as publishing powerhorse and [Svelte](https://svelte.dev/) for optimized frontend applicative layer.</small>
